text:
Idea Booth | Developer | Chicago, IL | ONSITE

Idea Booth is looking to hire a talented full-time developer with a focus on front-end technologies. Idea Booth is a digital marketing agency whose clients have included Nike, Walgreens, MTV, and more. Our development process is fast and iterative, where you'll have the opportunity engage with a broad range of exciting clients.

Tech stack: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Digital Ocean, Wordpress, Git

Website: http://www.idea-booth.com

Salary: 50k-75k + benefits

Contact: matthew [at] idea-booth [dot] com
